title: Getting my secondary role extremely often.
body:
Im queing for mid/top and while I know mid is the most wanted role I never had problems with getting my role. A few days ago i reached plat and since then i nearky never get mid. In my last 14 Soloq games I got mid 2 times and top 12 times. This also not counting the numerous times I dodged because of getting top.
I this simply bad luck or are their just that many mid laners in plat?
